title: 95/587/EC: Council Decision of 22 December 1995 authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7 March 1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 22 December 1995
authorizing the Kingdom of Spain to extend until 7  March 1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South  Africa
(95/587/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Kingdom of Spain is hereby authorized to extend until 7 March  1996 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into  force on 8 March 1982.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
L. ATIENZA SERNA
(1) OJ No L 142, 7. 6. 1994, p.  30.
